title: Understanding the SQL Statement
text: The SQL statement `SELECT $$2\left(5+1\right)`$$ is asking you to perform an arithmetic operation. The operation inside the parentheses is calculated first, following the order of operations.

title: Order of Operations
text: Remember the order of operations: Parentheses, Exponents, Multiplication and Division (from left to right), Addition and Subtraction (from left to right).

title: Calculate Inside the Parentheses
text: What is the result of the operation inside the parentheses $$5+1$$?

title: Multiply the Result
text: Now multiply the result from the parentheses by $$2$$. What do you get?
